attributes.action: Call a national emergency to stop the small boat crossings
attributes.additional_details: To halt paying for illegal migrants to stay in accommodation funded by the taxpayer and to keep the population safe by keeping the current illegal immigrant in secure accommodation and not let the roam around. Deport immediately if arrive illegally.
attributes.background: I want the current government to call for a National Emergency to stop these small boats crossing the English Channel

rejection.details: It is not clear what you mean in regards to declaring a national emergency and what sort of impact you would like this to have.
